\", please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
Whole Family Free GPS Locator Help.

Whole Family Free GPS Locator lets you locate any Android phone or tablet with GPS. No registration, no SMS, no paid plans, and GPS coordinates updated every 10 seconds! Whole Family Free GPS Locator uses GPS Tracker technology to accurately locate the people you care about, and server side to store GPS data. Features include:
Settings. Let you specify your username and password, and usernames and passwords for track users.
Search targets. Let you select one target and centers the map of its location.
Open the Google Play Store to leave rating and review.
Drag the panel with buttons in the most comfortable position, clinging to this picture.
Start/stop GPS-receiver and contacting the server.
Select the user to find it on the map.

Enter your username/password and usernames/passwords for your tracked goals. If the app is launched for the first time, enter new usernames/passwords, they will be registered on the server. Please use letters and digits only.
Below enter usernames and passwords for your tracked goals (one or both):
Send message. The maximum length is 200 characters.
Before sending the message, select at least one goal
No SD-card. Maps may be displayed incorrectly.
